text: Vam razreshayetsya blizost' s vashimi zhenami v noch', predshestvuyushchuyu postu. Vashi zheny dlya vas - odeyaniye, a vy - odeyaniye dlya nikh. Allakh uznal, chto vy ogranichivayete sebya, i On prostil vas i pomiloval. I teper' soyedinyaytes' s zhenami [po nocham mesyatsa ramadan] i stremites' k tomu, chto predpisal vam Allakh. Yesh'te i peyte, poka nel'zya budet otlichit' beluyu nitku ot chernoy, do rassveta, potom snova postites' do nochi. I ne soyedinyaytes' s zhenami v te nochi, kogda vy prebyvayete v mechetyakh. Eto - ogranicheniya, nalozhennyye Allakhom, tak ne narushayte zhe ikh. Tak raz"yasnyayet Allakh Svoi znameniya lyudyam, - byt' mozhet, oni stanut bogoboyaznennymi
